page.title: 20SATURDAYS
page.content: I am woken up at seven o'clock as usual by my Hitachi {digital clock {radio.}I listen to the Disc Jockey playing records. At about nine I go down and make Mum and Dad coffee with the Expresso{coffee machine.}I get it really frothy. I take them the paper and letters with the coffee. When we are all up we sometimes work in the {garden}keeping it tidy. We often go {shopping}on Saturdays because Mum and Dad work all the week. The shops are crowded and boring. It takes us nearly an hour to get to a big shopping centre. When we get back I may have time to play games on my{computer}or perhaps there will be something good on{television.}Sometimes I go up to the village on my{bike}by the back lanes. The main road is too dangerous. {
